definition: a favorite of sb in power/a celebrity/American Indian

sentences.english: Therefore, "Internet and media celebrities" to promote a blog is very powerful indeed.
sentences.chinese: 可見，“網絡紅人”的博客推廣確實很厲害。

sentences.english: No wonder the 'news raider' has become an overnight internet sensation.
sentences.chinese: 難怪這位“新聞闖客”會在一夜間成爲網絡紅人。

sentences.english: Scarlet were the clothes she wore.
Once upon a time, it was chiefly celebrities and high-profile Web users who were concerned about their search results.
sentences.chinese: 曾經只有名人和網絡紅人才會關心他們的搜索結果。

sentences.english: The Redskin defense isn't letting anything through today.
sentences.chinese: 紅人隊今天的防守是滴水不漏的。

sentences.english: Queen was a regular tabloid presence and a fixture at the Starling City club scene.
sentences.chinese: 奎恩曾是八卦小報紅人，也是斯特林市夜店的熟客。

sentences.english: As the white-haired boy, she got her promotion as expected soon.
sentences.chinese: 作爲大紅人，如預期一樣，她很快就升職了。

sentences.english: He is a faired boy of the boss.
They never came close to Redskins goal line.
sentences.chinese: 他們甚至都沒有機會靠近紅人隊的球門線。

sentences.english: He won the election by a large majority, and has become his party's fair-haired boy.
sentences.chinese: 他以壓倒性的多數票當選，已成爲黨內的紅人。

sentences.english: Michael Gambon, another veteran of stage, screen and television, plays Lord Fox.
sentences.chinese: 老戲骨兼舞臺和電視紅人米高甘博今次扮演霍士爵士。

sentences.english: This afternoon the New York Giants mopped the floor with the Washington Redskins.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午紐約巨人隊把華盛頓紅人隊打得一敗塗地。

definition: to join in the fun/to get in on the action/(fig.) to butt in/to create more trouble
"Mr Perfect" (i.e. tall, rich and handsome) (Internet slang)
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
(slang) to hook up for a one night stand/booty call
to take liberties with a woman/to dally/to assail a woman with obscenities
to buy soy sauce/it's none of my business ("I’m just here to buy some soy sauce")
to stand in a circle and watch
